content: first single_crochet and weave in tail fun things about this pattern 1 no extra sewing of parts 2 very versatile 3 you can use any yarn you like 4 any style/size eyes you like 5 nose no nose only yous knows ☺ 6 fairly quick to make this pattern and all photos in this document are the property of carrey reynolds @ mixedkreationsdesigns this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is allowed finished products created with this pattern may be sold it is appreciated if you give design credit to mixedkreations if you have any questions or need help don t hesitate to contact me ravelrypm-mixedkreations - www ravelry com/designers/carrey-rey-2 email - mixedkreations@gmail com facebook - www facebook com/groups/2359655124336466/ instagram - www instagram com/mixed_kreations/ notes page 2 of 2 copyright march 2025
